name: linear-companion
title: Linear Companion
description: Integrate LifeOS workflows directly into Linear to streamline life management and boost productivity.
author: sfkmk

preferences.name: searchDirectory
preferences.title: Search Directory
preferences.description: The root directory to search for project folders recursively. Defaults to home directory.
preferences.label: Projects Root

preferences.name: newFolderLocation
preferences.title: New Folder Location
preferences.description: Where new project folders should be created.
preferences.label: New Folders Root

preferences.name: allowEmojis
preferences.title: Folder Naming
preferences.label: Allow Emojis
preferences.description: Allow emojis in folder names. If unchecked, they will be removed.

preferences.name: linearPat
preferences.title: Linear PAT
preferences.description: Personal Access Token for Linear API (alternative to OAuth).
preferences.label: PAT

preferences.name: backlinkUrlScheme
preferences.title: Backlink URL
preferences.description: URL scheme for the backlink. Use {issueId} as a placeholder. If empty, backlinking is disabled.
preferences.label: URL Scheme

preferences.name: backlinkTitle
preferences.title: Backlink Title
preferences.description: The title of the link to be created in Linear.
preferences.label: Title

preferences.name: autoBacklinkOnCreate
preferences.title: Auto Backlinking
preferences.label: Create backlink on folder creation
preferences.description: Automatically add a resource link to the issue when a folder is created.

preferences.name: autoBacklinkOnOpen
preferences.title: Auto Backlinking
preferences.label: Create backlink on folder open
preferences.description: Automatically add a resource link to the issue when a folder is opened.

preferences.name: oauthClientId
preferences.title: Linear OAuth
preferences.description: Client ID for Linear OAuth App.
preferences.label: Client ID

preferences.name: oauthClientSecret
preferences.title: Linear OAuth Secret
preferences.description: Client Secret for Linear OAuth App (if using Confidential Client).
preferences.label: Client Secret

commands.name: open-issue-folder
commands.title: Open Issue Folder
commands.description: Opens the local folder corresponding to the current Linear issue.

preferences.name: autoCreateFolders
preferences.title: Auto-create Missing Folders
preferences.description: Automatically create a folder inside your 'New Folder Location' if none is found for the current issue.
preferences.label: Auto-create folders

commands.name: query-issue-folder
commands.title: Query Issue Folder
commands.description: Find folders matching a Linear Issue ID.

commands.name: copy-issue-id
commands.title: Copy Issue ID
commands.description: Copy the Issue ID from the active Linear window.

commands.name: backlink-all-folders
commands.title: Backlink All Issue Folders
commands.description: Scans and syncs backlinks for all found issue folders.

commands.name: authorize-linear
commands.title: Authorize Linear
commands.description: Connect to Linear to enable backlinking.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the `prepublishOnly` script and rerun `npm publish` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use `npm run publish` instead.

" && exit 1
